I don't know if this occurs on other OS's, but on Linux when the Firefox package is updated, a notification that says "Your browser has been updated and needs to be restarted" drops down from below the bookmark bar/location bar. When closed, in pops back up in a few seconds, and there is no way of permanently making it go away short of restarting the browser. I think the user should not be annoyed in this way, even if it is advisable to restart.

This is especially an issue on Nightly, since updates occur so frequently.

Reproducible: Always
